00005 namespace lang

00008 
00009 class LinkedListItemBase
00010 {
00011 public:
00015     bool    linked() const      {return 0 != m_next || 0 != m_previous;}
00016 
00017 protected:
00018     LinkedListItemBase() : m_next(0), m_previous(0) {}
00019     virtual ~LinkedListItemBase();
00020 
00021     friend class LinkedListBase;
00022     LinkedListItemBase* m_next; 
00023     LinkedListItemBase* m_previous;
00024 
00025 private:
00026     LinkedListItemBase( const LinkedListItemBase& );
00027     LinkedListItemBase& operator=( const LinkedListItemBase& );
00028 };
00029 
00030 class LinkedListBase
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     LinkedListBase();
00034     virtual ~LinkedListBase();
00035     
00036     void    insert( LinkedListItemBase* item );
00037     void    remove( LinkedListItemBase* item );
00038 
00039     LinkedListItemBase*     last() const;
00040 
00041 protected:
00042     LinkedListItemBase*     m_first;
00043 
00044 private:
00045     LinkedListBase( const LinkedListBase& );
00046     LinkedListBase& operator=( const LinkedListBase& );
00047 };
00048 
00053 template <class T> class LinkedListItem :
00054     public LinkedListItemBase
00055 {
00056 public:
00060     T*      next() const            {return static_cast<T*>( m_next );}
00061 
00065     T*      previous() const        {return static_cast<T*>( m_previous );}
00066 };
00067 
00072 template <class T> class LinkedList :
00073     public LinkedListBase
00074 {
00075 public:
00079     void    insert( T* item )       {LinkedListBase::insert( item );}
00080 
00084     void    remove( T* item )       {LinkedListBase::remove( item );}
00085 
00089     T*      first() const           {return static_cast<T*>( m_first );}
00090     
00094     T*      last() const            {return static_cast<T*>( LinkedListBase::last() );}
00095 };
